caption.p: Crystallographic analysis in sample Z direction of simulated ( a) CGHAZ, ( c) FGHAZ, EBSD superimposed figure of band contrast and grain boundaries (misorientation < 15° in red line, misorientation > 15° in green line) of simulated ( b) CGHAZ, ( d) FGHAZ with t 8/5 of 25 s. ( e) Curves of misorientation angle-relative frequency of simulated HAZs.
